LanguageData.IW.ClickToDropTip: Currently taking output to stockpile. Click to drop on floor.
LanguageData.IW.ClickToTakeToStockpileTip: Currently dropping output on floor. Click to take to stockpile.
LanguageData.IW.RenameBillTip: Rename bill (use empty string to reset)
LanguageData.IW.CrafterWillToSpecificStockpileTip: Crafter will take final product to specified stockpile
LanguageData.IW.CopyFilterTip: Copy ingredients filter settings, for pasting into a matching filter
LanguageData.IW.RenameTip: Click to enter a value using keyboard
LanguageData.IW.WillCountTowardsTargetTip: Only items in specified stockpile will count towards target.
LanguageData.IW.HitPointsTip: Only items with given hitpoints range will count towards target
LanguageData.IW.QualityTip: Only items of given quality range will count towards target
LanguageData.IW.IngredientsTip: Only items made from ingredients in input ingredients filter (on rightmost column) will count towards target
LanguageData.IW.CountCorpseClothesDesc: Include corpse worn clothing in item count
LanguageData.IW.CountInventoryDesc: Also count items currently being worn, equipped or carried by any colonist or colony animal
LanguageData.IW.CountAwayDesc: Also count items on any colonist or animal sent on a caravan, in transport pods, in cryptosleep chambers, or otherwise unavailable
LanguageData.IW.CountInstalledDesc: Also count items that have been installed as a building
LanguageData.IW.ChangeLinkedBillModeText: Use Details to change linked bill mode
LanguageData.IW.CopyAllTip: Copy all bills in this workbench
LanguageData.IW.PasteAllTip: Paste copied bill(s) as new bill(s) here.
LanguageData.IW.PasteLinkTip: Paste copied bill(s) and link them back to original(s). Changes will be mirrored to all connected bills.
LanguageData.IW.AutoOpenBillTabLabel: Automatically open bills and storage tabs
LanguageData.IW.AutoOpenBillTabDesc: When a workbench (or stockpile) is selected, its bills (or storage) tab will be opened immediately
LanguageData.IW.ShowItemCountInFilterDesc: Shows item counts in ingredients tab in bill details
LanguageData.IW.EnableDragToReorderDesc: If you find it conflicting with other mods, you can disable the 'drag to reorder bills' functionality in workbench overview
LanguageData.IW.PasteBillSettings: Paste all settings (except output product) from copied bill into this one
LanguageData.IW.MirrorSuspendedStatusDesc: If enabled, when a linked bill is suspended or unsuspended, all linked bills will take on the same status. (Note: Toggling this setting to True will trigger synchronisation on all linked jobs)
LanguageData.IW.DropOnFloorByDefaultDesc: New bills will default to "Drop on floor" instead of "Take to best stockpile".
LanguageData.IW.ShowExtraUIButtonsDesc: Show buttons that let you set "target count" and "resume level" values in bill details via the keyboard. Disable if you have a mod or language that causes these buttons to become misplaced.
